name: Number of Folds
description:
Suppose I have a big paper and i want to draw `n` number of `grids` just by folding it (see example ). How many times do i have to fold it to get `n` number of `grids`.
eg.
```
n=1 , 0 operation, the original paper is one grid.

n=2, 1 operations, i have to fold it 1 time to get 2 grids (A,B).

 _______
|   |   |
| A | B |
|   |   |
|   |   |
|___|___|
```
No edge cases, all inputs are valid, But some built-in `Math` functions will have `NO` power here.
